scripts.hot: npm run clean-content-base && npm run fake-trans && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --hot --open --content-base $npm_package_config_content_base
scripts.dev: npm run clean-content-base && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --progress --display-modules --display-chunks > ./$npm_package_config_content_base/build.log
scripts.build: npm run clean-content-base && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --progress --display-modules --display-chunks > ./$npm_package_config_content_base/build.log
scripts.dist-test: npm run build && npm run fake-trans && npm run serve-app
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run orig-trans && npm run serve-app
